name: Mr. Dog
description: Reveal the secrets of the evil family! Find out why Granny and Grandpa were chasing you and your friends. After you had successfully escaped from Granny and Grandpa and were passing Mr. Dog’s house, you noticed that the fat man had caught one of your friends after all. Mr. Dog is that same policeman, Granny and Grandpa’s son. You’ve got to get inside his mansion and help your friend to escape. Keep in mind, however, that the process is not going to be easy. Mr. Dog’s house is a true prison — and escaping from prison has never been easy. It’s the dead of night, there are no neighbors around, and there is no point in calling the police. But your friend is counting on you to save him! So hurry up!
